name: Chewie, Enraged
Lore: 'Smuggler. Very few people need to be told that angry Wookiees should be given a wide berth.',
Text: 'X = number of Imperials present. While with Han or Leia, adds 2 to your battle destiny draws here. During your turn, target one Imperial pr power < 5 present. Target''s game text canceled for remainder of turn. End of your turn: Use 2 Force to maintain OR Lose 1 Force to place in Used Pile OR Place out of play.',
